btv.download.message

Class Bitfield

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.download.message.Message
      • btv.download.message.Bitfield

  • public class Bitfield
extends Message
    This class represents a Bitfield message. BitTorrent peers send Bitfield messages to inform other peers about the parts of the file they have
    See Also:
    Message

      • bitSet

        public boolean bitSet(int i)
        Check if the bit at position i is set in this Bitfield
        Parameters:
        i - The position in the Bitfield to check.
        Returns:
        True if the bit at position i is set, false otherwise.
